description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Choose from 3 claw machines, each with 5 claw types and their own quirks.  Includes a normal machine filled with random junk, a fish machine that has swimming fishies, and a space machine filled with sucking blackholes and exploding supernovae.  Can you master the claw?
